pageContent:
Lakshmi Neelima Nandula 
E-mail: neelimanandula9@gmail.com            LinkedIn          Contact no: +1-732-993-8545 
 
Profile: 
 
➢ Cloud Database administrator with 8+ years of experience. 
➢ MongoDB (NoSQL) & MS SQL Server database Administrator. 
➢ Architect, deploy, administer, and optimize MongoDB (NoSQL) instances on Mongo Atlas, AWS 
EC2, and on-prem. 
➢ Architect,  deploy,  administer,  and  optimize  MS  SQL  Server  instances  on  AWS  RDS  and  on-
prem. 
➢ Implement HA solutions across various Database systems. 
➢ Implement Auto-scaling of MongoDB instances using Mongo Atlas. 
➢ Tune the performance of MongoDB and SQL Server instances by implementing indexes. 
➢ Perform Backup & Restore of MongoDB instances from and to AWS S3. 
➢ Plan and implement database migrations from and to AWS to on-prem. 
➢ Enthusiastic learner who quickly grasps new concepts and technical skills. 
➢ Highly motivated, dependable troubleshooter and problem-solver. 
 
Skill Set:

➢ Enthusiastic learner who quickly grasps new concepts and technical skills. 
➢ Highly motivated, dependable troubleshooter and problem-solver. 
 
Skill Set: 
 
Technology   Skills 
Cloud AWS 
Database NoSQL, MongoDB 4.x, 3.x, Mongo Atlas, Mongo Ops Manager 
 SQL Server 2019, 2017, 2016, 2014, 2012, 2008R2, 2005 
Script Python, Linux shell, Windows Powershell 
Operating System  RHEL, CentOS, Fedora, MS Windows Server 
 
Educational Qualifications: 
• Master  of  Science  in  Management  Information  Systems- Aug'23 |  Auburn  University  at 
Montgomery, USA. 
 
Professional Experience: 
1. WebMD Health Corp. 
Duration                  May 2023 – Present 
Designation  Database Administrator 
 
Project Profile:       
• Manage and optimize MongoDB and MS SQL Server databases supporting critical applications 
and services for WebMD Health Corp. 
• Lead database architecture design, ensuring scalability, reliability, and high performance to

and services for WebMD Health Corp. 
• Lead database architecture design, ensuring scalability, reliability, and high performance to 
meet the demands of a high-traffic healthcare platform. 
• Spearhead database security initiatives, adhering to industry standards (HIPAA, HITECH) to 
protect sensitive healthcare information. 
• Implement robust backup and recovery strategies, minimizing downtime and ensuring data 
availability during critical scenarios. 
• Collaborate  closely  with  development  and  infrastructure  teams  to  streamline  database 
integrations and enhancements. 
• Conduct  routine  performance  tuning,  query  optimization,  and  capacity  planning  to  ensure 
optimal database performance.

2 
2. ICICI BANK LTD 
Duration                  January 2017 – May 2022 
Designation  Sr. Database Engineer 
 
Project Profile:    
• Architected, deployed, administered, and optimized PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and SQL Server 
instances on AWS and on-premises environments. 
• Implemented HA solutions and conducted database server migrations across datacenters. 
• Configured high availability (Replication) in PostgreSQL, MongoDB Shard clusters, and tuned 
system parameters for PostgreSQL. 
• Implemented  secure  authentication  (x509,  Kerberos,  LDAP)  for  PostgreSQL  and  SQL  Server 
clusters. 
• Led the implementation of disaster recovery setups and best practices, including testing and 
failover. 
• Gathered requirements, built business cases, and documented system specifications for new 
functionalities. 
• Oversaw   testing   phases   including   integration   testing,   end-to-end   testing,   and   user 
acceptance testing (UAT).

functionalities. 
• Oversaw   testing   phases   including   integration   testing,   end-to-end   testing,   and   user 
acceptance testing (UAT). 
• Analyzed,   manipulated,   and   updated   databases   using   SQL   (including   PostgreSQL); 
coordinated user acceptance testing. 
• Facilitated the Postproduction Validation and actively participated in production call support 
whenever necessary and ensured smooth running of the system in real time. 
• Involved in Analyzing, manipulating, and updating Databases using SQL. 
• Coordinated  User  Acceptance  Testing - provided  guidance  for  system  behavior,  identified 
testing scenarios, reviewing test scripts and objectives, creating UAT plans, presenting and 
reviewing the results with business teams. 
 
3. Frux Software Solutions Pvt Ltd. 
Duration                  Aug 2014 – Dec 2016 
Designation  Business Analyst 
 
Project Profile:

reviewing the results with business teams. 
 
3. Frux Software Solutions Pvt Ltd. 
Duration                  Aug 2014 – Dec 2016 
Designation  Business Analyst 
 
Project Profile:       
• Worked closely with development staff to contribute to the identification, assessment, and 
integration of wide-ranging technologies and advanced concepts which facilitate the 
development, refactoring, and re-architecting of systems across different security domains 
to ensure successful migration to the Cloud. 
• Lead the Scrum Team's Product Backlog grooming, User Story development and Sprint 
prioritization. 
• Coordinate across LOB's product owners, project managers, stakeholders, and subject 
matter experts (SMEs) as the lead Business Analyst. 
• Involved in all phases of data mining, data collection, data cleaning, developing models, 
validation, visualization and performed Gap analysis. 
• Articulate default customers profiles along with reports using Python and Tableau to

validation, visualization and performed Gap analysis. 
• Articulate default customers profiles along with reports using Python and Tableau to 
generate analytical results and strategic implications to senior management for strategic 
decision making. 
• Conducted data mining, cleaning, model development, and visualization, employing Python 
and Tableau. 
• Work with developers, user experience designers, subject matter experts, legal and 
compliance teams to obtain a well-rounded understanding of what is being asked for and 
our ability to deliver it within the constraints of our banking environment. 
• Engaged in creation of project workflows. Demos, User guides, support manuals for 
Technology Teams through JIRA. 
 
References: Available upon request
